There is significant variability in the resource data for these deposit types, and ore controls vary from one region to another.</purpose>         </descript>         <timeperd>             <timeinfo> <enttyp>                 <enttypl>main</enttypl>                 <enttypd>General descriptive information about the deposit</enttypd>             </enttyp>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>rec_id</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Record ID. A distinct numerical identifier for the database record without further scientific significance, assigned by the data manager of mrdata.usgs.gov. Integer values. Int of width 4.</attrdef>                 <attrdomv>                     <rdom>                         <rdommin>1</rdommin>                         <rdommax>240</rdommax>                         <attrmres>1</attrmres>                     </rdom>                 </attrdomv>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>district</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>District. Textual values of no more than 26 characters.</attrdef>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>latitude</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Latitude. Geographic latitude of the deposit, in decimal degrees WGS84, south latitude negative. General classification of the deposit as MVT (Mississippi Valley Type), CD (clastic-dominated), or UN (unclassified). Textual values of no more than 3 characters.</attrdef>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>alttype</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Alternative Classification. Any alternative classification commonly given for the deposit, includes BHT (Broken Hill type), carbonate-hosted/replacement, or sh (shale) or cc (coarse clastic). Textual values of no more than 23 characters.</attrdef>                 <attrdomv>                     <edom>                         <edomv>(no value)</edomv>                         <edomvd>Information not available for this record. 230 records have no value for alttype.</edomvd>                     </edom>                 </attrdomv>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>tectset</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Tectonic Setting. Generalized tectonic setting: PM (passive margin), BA (back arc basin), CS (continental sag), RF (rift), or UN (unclassified). Textual values of no more than 2 characters.</attrdef>                 <attrdomv>                     <edom>                         <edomv>(no value)</edomv>                         <edomvd>Information not available for this record. 128 records have no value for tectset.</edomvd>                     </edom>                 </attrdomv>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>hostrock</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Host Rocks. Textual values of no more than 89 characters.</attrdef>             </attr>             <attr>                 <attrlabl>oreton</attrlabl>                 <attrdef>Size (tonnage). Deposit size given in million metric tons of ore. Mineralization ages, with the method of determining age in parentheses after each estimate.
